page.title: 19A Day in the life of....
page.content: Some people have school dinners, and some have packed lunches. We finish lunch at 12:45 and have dinner play. We come in at 1:15 and read until register is called,then we do rolling programme. For rolling programme we do a rota of subjects like art, computers, C.D.T (craft design and technology),project,and finishing our target work. At 2:30 we stop to have play. After play we carry on doing rolling programme until home time. Some of us put the computers away then we go home. Some of us go home on the school bus but most of us are either collected by our parents or walk home. When we get home most of us have a drink and something to eat and then watch T.V. We play outside until 6pm, when we have supper. We watch TV until bedtime, which is from 9pm on.
